name: The Saga Of Sir Thimb
description:
Follow Sir Thimb, a tiny hero with a big role to play in this epic tale of miniature proportions! Under the roots of three sacred trees, a discarded Game Boy has become a shrine for the tiny beings.

Explore above and below the surface while you jump and slash your way through a big world on a small scale. Seek out the wise oracle and help return peace to the land. Fight a few ugly bugs and plant the three sacred seeds to return power to the Flora Folk's shrine.

Made for GBJAM10, Hosted by retroshark & Polyducks
By: Idnit Media & Inkwell Imp

Controls

Move - WASD, Up, Down, Left, Right (D-Pad)

Jump - K, X, Alt (A Button)

Slash - J,Z,Ctrl (B Button)

Approximate playtime ~ 20-30 minutes

There is no save feature in this build.
